div.div: We are the Redhawks courageous and true. We stand for honor In all that we do!

div.p: We are one of the highest testing and scored schools in Utah. ThisÂ graph represents the percent of students proficient in each of the academic areas listed and shows how we compare to schools in our area.

div.h1: What our parents and students love about The Ranches Academy

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_testimonial et_pb_testimonial_0 clearfix et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_testimonial_no_image

div.em: âI really love the quality of education I feel like my child is receiving. The school is smaller so I feel like he gets more individual attention instead of just being a number.â

p.span: âI like that we have nice and good teachers so when youâre thinking about what teacher youâre going to get the next year, youâre never worried because every teacher teaches good and is very nice. I also like all of the activites we have, it gives us experience.âÂ

em.span: âI think there are WONDERFUL teachers and staff at the school who truly care about the students and their learning and growing. I love the parent involvement. And I love all the extra activities the school, teachers, and FSO do for our school. I feel like they really add to our childrenâs learning environment.â
